item.title: Setting Up Alerts and Basic Automation for PostgreSQL - Percona Community PostgreSQL Live Stream & Chat - March 25th
item.description: Percona Community organized live stream to talk more about Setting Up Alerts and Basic Automation for PostgreSQL. This recording is from the live event of March 25th with Matt Yonkovit, Charly Batista and Agustin Gallego. This is a part of the Percona Community bi-weekly Live Stream series to discuss Postgres-related topics and deep talks with technology secrets. Video Link: https://youtu.be/f1NklbrVvYY Transcript Matt Yonkovit: Hello, hello, everyone, Welcome to another Friday edition of the Postgres Percona database meetup.

item.title: Observing & Tuning Your PostgreSQL Workload Using PMM - Community PostgreSQL Live Stream & Chat - March 11th
item.description: Organize and access easily to your database data by observing and tuning your PostgreSQL workload using PMM. Our experts Matt Yonkovit and Charly Batista present use cases in a bi-weekly live stream about Postgres-related topics. Video Part 01 Link: https://youtu.be/H2uNDbQ8lCk Video Part 02 Link: https://youtu.be/SxQyC2RdBCg Transcript

item.title: Installing PG and Setting Up a Default Configuration - Community PostgreSQL Live Stream & Chat - Jan 27th
item.description: Listen out to this full recording of the 1st Live Stream dedicated to PostgreSQL hosted by The Head Of Open Source Strategy at Percona, Matt Yonkovit with Charly Batista, PostgreSQL Tech Lead at Percona. They took us through the installation of Postgres and the setting up of the default configuration. This is a part of the bi-weekly Live Streaming series to discuss Postgres-related topics and go deep into technology secrets and tricks.
